data

Class Motors

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Motors
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Motors
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Represents a Motors class that controls the movement of motors. This class utilizes the DataExchange object for transferring information between threads.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Motors(DataExchange DE, int speed)
      Constructs a new Motors object with the specified DataExchange and speed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getSpeed()
      Retrieves the speed of the motors.
      void run()
      Executes the main logic of the motors in a separate thread.
      void setSpeed(int speed)
      Sets the speed of the motors.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Motors

        public Motors(DataExchange DE,
      int speed)
        Constructs a new Motors object with the specified DataExchange and speed.
        Parameters:
        DE - The DataExchange object for transferring information between threads.
        speed - The initial speed of the motors.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Executes the main logic of the motors in a separate thread. This method controls the movement of the motors based on sensor inputs.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • getSpeed

        public int getSpeed()
        Retrieves the speed of the motors.
        Returns:
        The current speed of the motors.

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed(int speed)
        Sets the speed of the motors.
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed to set for the motors.
